name: Kratus: The Awakening
description:
Kratus The Awakening is my first game and a project I have been working on for a while. Still not that far in development and lots more planned. Comment What you think of it and what I should change. There is a bonus arcade you can play if you collect a item during the game at the end.

Game was built for 1080 so if your not using 1080 than comment if it worked fine or if there was any U.I. errors.

Disclaimer: I did not make boss music, I got it online but it will be changed later.

Controls:

WASD: Move

J: Attack

K: Heal(Uses 5 void fragments)

Space: Jump
